attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in our local authority if your child doesnt have a statement of special educational needs they may not attend a specialist school setting. There are children in mainstream schools who would benefit from such a school but dont meet the criteria for a statement.  Some of these childrens needs are not being meet in mainsteam although most schools try very hard, the expertise is at specialist settings. it would be better if children who have a need rather than a statement could attend a specialist setting. Please allow this to happen. i am asking the prime minister to stop this practise within local authorities.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
